ems_access_scores:ems_3sfca.long_name: Emergency medical services access score (3-step floating catchment areas)
ems_access_scores:ems_3sfca.short_description: Index of emergency medical services accessibility based on supply and demand of facilities
ems_access_scores:ems_3sfca.long_description: Emergency medical services access score based on 3-step floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of facilities per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a facility is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for facilities (adult population).
ems_access_scores:ems_3sfca.statement: The emergency medical services accessibility score for {features.name} is {value}
